title: PIPsUS: Self-supervised Point Tracking in Ultrasound

abstract: Finding point-level correspondences is a fundamental problem in ultrasound (US), enabling US landmark tracking for intraoperative image guidance and motion estimation. Most US tracking methods are based on optical flow or feature matching …
